ca.ualberta.cs.w18t11.whoselineisitanyway.controller

Interface DataSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataSourceManager, LocalDataSource, MockDataSource, RemoteDataSource

    public interface DataSource
    Represents a user-bid-task data source.
    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Brad Ofrim, Samuel Dolha

      • getBid

        @Nullable
Bid getBid(@NonNull
                     java.lang.String providerUsername,
                     @NonNull
                     java.lang.String taskId)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns:
        The bid from that provider on that task, or null if no such bid exists in the data source.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - For an empty providerUsername or taskId.
        See Also:
        Bid

      • getBids

        @Nullable
Bid[] getBids()
        Returns:
        All bids present in the data source, or null if an error occurs.
        See Also:
        Bid

      • getTask

        @Nullable
Task getTask(@NonNull
                       java.lang.String taskId)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns:
        The task with that taskId, or null if no such task exists in the data source.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - For an empty taskId.
        See Also:
        Task

      • getTask

        @Nullable
Task getTask(@NonNull
                       java.lang.String requesterUsername,
                       @NonNull
                       java.lang.String title)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns:
        The task with that requester and title, or null if no such task exists in the data source.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - For an empty requesterUsername or title.
        See Also:
        Task

      • getTasks

        @Nullable
Task[] getTasks()
        Returns:
        All tasks present in the data source, or null if an error occurs.
        See Also:
        Task

      • getUser

        @Nullable
User getUser(@NonNull
                       java.lang.String username)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - For an empty username.
        See Also:
        User

      • getUsers

User[] getUsers()
        Returns:
